plot: When she discovers that her husband is playing poker instead of "visiting a sick friend," his wife makes it appear she has a "visiting lover" of her own.
title: His Sick Friend
plot_es: When she discovers that her husband is playing poker instead of "visiting a sick friend," his wife makes it appear she has a "visiting lover" of her own.
plot_en: When she discovers that her husband is playing poker instead of "visiting a sick friend," his wife makes it appear she has a "visiting lover" of her own.

produce.name: Independent Moving Pictures Co. of America (IMP)
